attributes.action: Close the Aberdeen bypass at Westhill and Kingswells
attributes.additional_details: Since the kind citizens of Kingswells and Westhill are so against the new development we feel it only fair to reciprocate by cutting off access to the new AWPR a.k.a. Aberdeen Bypass.
attributes.background: The New Aberdeen Stadium would be the home stadium of Aberdeen FC replacing replace Pittodrie and would be located near Kingswells and Westhill in the west of Aberdeen.  A community action group of local residents, "No Kingsford Stadium", was established to campaign against the proposed development.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
